comments.text:
Created attachment 502992
screenshot of existing dialog

Currently, we ask a Yes/No question, which users are likely to close without reading. Or worse, they'll waste time reading the question.

Let's make the buttons be browsers (icons + names) instead.  We'll have to grab the name and icon of the current default from the system.
